param.name: guestEnable
param.label: Enabled for guests
param.description: Should Filepicker be enabled for guests?

param.name: guestEnableUploads
param.label: Enabled uploads for guests
param.description: Should uploading be enabled for guests?

param.name: guestRootPath
param.label: Rootpath for guests
param.description: Which should be the root path of the filemanager?

param.name: guestFileExtensions
param.label: Legal file extensions viewing for guests
param.description: Which file extensions are allowed for viewing for guests, if configuration settings are not used?

param.name: guestFileExtensionsUpload
param.label: Legal file extensions for uploading for guests
param.description: Which file extensions are allowed to be uploaded for guests, if configuration settings are not used?

param.name: FileImages
param.label: Images for filetypes
param.description: Comma or enter seperated list of filetype with image reference. Use {ComponentImagePath} as a placeholder of /components/com_filepicker/assets/images/filetypes/.

param.name: DefaultFileImage
param.label: Default file image
param.description: Image which should be loaded for file extensions, which are not supported 'Images for filetypes'. Use {ComponentImagePath} as a placeholder of /components/com_filepicker/assets/images/filetypes/.
